name: Pictlogica Final Fantasy Nearly Equal
overview: Pictlogica Final Fantasy was a free-to-play action puzzle game developed by Jupiter for iOS and Android. A Nintendo 3DS Download-only version was announced and released in Japan on July 12, 2017, featuring new puzzles and a new game mode. The 3DS version of the game includes over 300 completely revamped puzzles designed in nostalgic pixel art. Players are able to fight classic enemies in quest battles, and collect 160 beloved characters from the Final Fantasy series
